description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the supply of Qtysixteen (16) Pintle Trailer and related items in accordance with Supply ArrangementE60HP-17TRLR for Configuration BW-C, OW-B, OW-C, OW-D. The requested delivery dateis 150 days after receipt of order (ARO). GSIN: N2330
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement: Pintle Trailer

## Solicitation Details

| Field Name | Field Value |
| --- | --- |
| Title (English) | Pintle Trailer |
| Title (French) | Remorque à anneau d’attelage |
| Reference Number | cb-66-20320692 |
| Amendment Number | 2 |
| Solicitation Number | W8476-236708/A |
| Publication Date | October 5, 2023 |

## Tender Closing and Contract Details

| Field Name | Field Value |
| --- | --- |
| Tender Closing Date | October 24, 2023 at 2:00 PM EST |
| Expected Contract Start Date | N/A |
| Expected Contract End Date | N/A |
| Tender Status (English) | Expired |
| Tender Status (French) | Expiré |

## Service Description

The Department of National Defence requires the supply of 18 Pintle Trailers with associated items, under Supply Arrangement E60HP-17TRLR, Contract Configuration BW-C, OW-B, OW-C, OW-D. The requested delivery date is 120 days after receipt of order. The Supply Arrangement E60HP-17TRLR is open to pre-qualified suppliers.

## Notice and Documentation

- **Notice Type (English)** : Request for Supply Arrangement
- **Notice Type (French)** : Demande pour un arrangement en matière d’approvisionnement
- **Procurement Method (English)** : Competitive - Selective tendering
- **Procurement Method (French)** : Concurrentielle - Appel d'offres sélectif
- **Selection Criteria (English)** : Lowest Price
- **Selection Criteria (French)** : Prix le plus bas
- **Trade Agreements**: [list of applicable trade agreements]

## Contact Information

| Field Name | Field Value |
| --- | --- |
| Contact Name | Dong Le |
| Contact Email | [dong.le@forces.gc.ca](mailto:dong.le@forces.gc.ca) |
| Contact Phone (Extension) | (999) 999-9999 |

## Attachments and Documents

- No attachments or documents are provided.

## Important Notes

- This Bid Solicitation Process is intended for Suppliers holding a Supply Arrangement (SA) under the Request for Supply Arrangement (RFSA) E60HP-17TRLR.
- Suppliers not holding a SA may become pre-qualified by visiting [link](https://buyandsell
